business.label: Baptisms
business.promptEnd: [name] has been baptized this week and we would like to congratulate [him/her] on [his/her] decision to follow the Savior into the waters of baptism.

business.label: Ordinations
business.prompt: We propose that the following individuals be ordained to offices in the Aaronic Priesthood. As Deacons and to recieve the Aaronic Priesthood...
business.promptEnd: Those in favor may show it by the uplifted hand [...] Those opposed, if any, may also show it.

business.label: New Move Ins
business.prompt: We have recieved the records for a new family in our ward. Will you please stand as your name is read:
business.prompt2: All those who would like to welcome these individuals into our ward may show it by the uplifted hand.

business.label: Releases
business.prompt: The following have been released and we propose that they be given a vote of thanks:
business.promptEnd: All those who wish to show their appreciation for these individuals and their service may show it by the uplifted hand.

business.label: Callings
business.prompt: The following have been called and we propose that they be sustained, will you please stand as your name is read:
business.promptEnd: All those in favor of sustaining these individuals in their new callings may show it by the uplifted hand [...] Those opposed, if any, may also show it.

business.label: Deaths
business.prompt: We are deeply saddened to inform you that [name] has passed away. Our thoughts and prayers go out to [his/her] family and loved ones at this time. (Announce funeral date & time)
